author: Andre Maniam JC:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Originating Summons No 895 of 2020
counsel: Roderick Martin SC, Gideon Yap and Eugene Tan (RHTLaw Asia LLP) for the plaintiff; Sanjiv Rajan, Leong Yi-Ming and Wong Pei Ting (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the defendant.

headings.text: The Tribunal expressly found that the Respondent was not in breach of the JVA
The grounds on which the Tribunal dismissed the Claimant’s claim for breach of contract, had been put in issue
The parties acted as if there were no breach
If there were no obligation to procure a licence renewal, there could be no breach in that regard
The parties amicably agreed to wind down the JV business, and end the JVA
